extensionDescription.message: Companion to r/HFY epub generator. Allows to expand the functionality and bypass CORS restrictions.

pageRequestsAuthDetails.message: This page is requesting access to $URL$. Keep in mind that this includes all cookies and other identifying tokens.

optionsUseTabDetails.message: This uses a tab to fetch the chapter contents, as if a regular user accssed the page.

optionsWaitSelectorDetails.message: Wait for the specified CSS selector to be available (i.e. `document.querySelector(...)` returns an element).
